ns:common.document.text:
WLanguage is the programming language of WinDev, WebDev, and WinDev Mobile.
WLanguage is a 4GL (4th generation language), the function names use explicit English terms close to everyday language (WLanguage functions are also available in French).
Both “standard” programming and “object oriented” programming are available in WLanguage.
WLanguage is used to manage:
